recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, crisp the guanciale in a pan.
Whisk eggs and grated cheese in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water.
Combine pasta, egg mixture, and guanciale off the heat. Stir quickly to create a creamy sauce, adding pasta water if needed.

recipes.name: Classic Tiramisu
recipes.description: A coffee-flavored Italian dessert made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese.
instructions: Brew coffee and let it cool.
Beat yolks with sugar until creamy, then mix with mascarpone.
Beat egg whites to stiff peaks and fold into the mascarpone mixture.
Quickly dip ladyfingers in coffee and arrange in a dish.
Layer with the mascarpone cream. Repeat layers.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.
